Goychim Ferry

Goychim Ferry

Ferries are the lifeline of many places inn Goa (Amche Goy). There are not many ferries in operation in Goa. The experience of traveling in those ferries is one of kind experience. Suraj is developed this app for the people of so that they can enjoy the experience of sailing on board a Goychim ferry.

Android App

play.google.com/goychimferry

Download the very popular Android app from the Android play store and never miss a ferry again!

Windows App

www.microsoft.com/goychimferry

Suraj has recently come up with the windows version of the Goychim ferry app. All you windows phone users try out the latest release!

Project Details

Date: Oct 13, 2016

Author: Presley Dias

Categories: project

Tagged: Projects, App

Developer: SGS (Suraj Sakhardande)

Website: https://www.facebook.com/goychimferry

About

I believe in learning when ever and where ever I can. I also believe that I need to give back to the society. I am blessed with a loving, caring and generous family who has alway supported me in what ever I do. So besides making websites for schools, I also open to conduct workshops for school or college students. Adopt an institute and fully automate the working of the institue. Help the teachers to make education fun and help the students to make learning fun!
